attributes.action: Lower the cost of education for adults ageed 19+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Education for people aged 19+ is quite expensive for anybody, regrdless of whether they are working or not.
It is continually said that the government want to get adults back into education, but how are we supposed to pay for it?
I' m not trying to abolish cost completley, but at least find a way of lowering them so that working people can afford to better themselves
